title: Heartseeker Lucian
body: It gave me the option to buy Heartseeker Lucian but when I went to purchase him it had an error message, It took my RP and it says the skin is unavailable?  But it still shows him in the shop as able to buy I'm so confused.

replies.body: I looked at your account and it seems the skin should be usable. Give your client a quick restart and let me know if you can select it in a custom match.

I restarted the client a few hours after it happened and  It didn't work the first time but I tried it again and it worked.
I appreciate you looking into the issue!
Sorry I wasn't able to let you know it was working sooner, I  don't check the site often.
